attributes.action: enable an adoption decision to be reversed if the essential facts leading to the adoption process have materially changed, and to reaffirm the natural justice of parents having rights over their own progeny
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is being raised because of the recent case where parents have suffered the loss of their 3 elder children due to fears that they were being harmed. Now that the facts used to justify removing 3 children from their parents have been shown to be unsafe,the case for the adoption has been lost.The three children should be back with their own flesh and blood because there is a miscarriage of natural justice being allowed to happen if they do not.How can anyone stand by and allow this to happen?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
